item.description:
Iron Man 2 opens on May 7. Let's get together for a show on Saturday evening. According to moviefone.com, it's playing at Showcase North in Worcester at 7:00 PM. Let's meet at 6:30 PM in the Showcase lobby.

Anyone who want to can join me for dinner after the movie.

Robert Downey Jr. once again plays billionaire Tony Stark, inventor of a super-suit of armor and its cold-fusion power source. Gwyneth Paltrow plays Virginia Potts, his assistant. Also starring Don Cheadle as Col. James Rhodes, Mickey Rourke, Sam Rockwell, and Scarlett Johansson.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone is 508-981-0455.

Here's a link to the synopsis at moviefone.com: http://www.moviefone....

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Iron Man 2
